abstract: Research in Motion is set to hold its annual conference for software developers, hoping to persuade them to build apps for new BlackBerrys and PlayBook tablets, devices it hopes will rescue struggling equipment maker.
snippet: Starting Tuesday, the company will hold its annual conference for software developers, to persuade them to build apps for new BlackBerrys and PlayBook tablets.
lead_paragraph: Starting Tuesday, the company will hold its annual conference for software developers, to persuade them to build apps for new BlackBerrys and PlayBook tablets.

headline.main: Battered, RIM Pins Hopes on Next Wave of Devices
headline.print_headline: Battered, RIM Pins Hopes on Next Wave of Devices
headline.seo: Research in Motion Pins Hopes on Its Next OS
